oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Mountain Bushman. By /han=kasso (L VIII.-22. 7982 rev.-7984 rev.). Regarding Mountain Bushmen. (L VIII.-26. 8280 rev.). A note about the 'Mountain Bushmen' (!kaugen !k'e), who live in the mountain 'kloofs' (or valleys) on the side of the Tki (a river). Another group of |xam (or branch of the 'Mountain Bushmen', called the !kaugen ss'o !k'e) lives to the south of the 'Mountain Bushmen'.
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Mountain 'Bushmen'
